a.title: Learn more about Independence School District
a.span: Go to Independence School District Information

div.h1: Welcome to the Independence School District

td.p: Click on the picture to learn more about our district!
We will maximize learning and empower all students to prepare for tomorrow's opportunities.
In partnership with the community, our school will be an innovative leader in education with excellent, focused, collaborative programs and staff.

div.div: Teacher and Professional Staff Appreciation Week

div.h2: Teacher and Professional Staff Appreciation Week
div.p: May 4-May 8th is Teacher and Professional Staff Appreciation week. Take some time to show your appreciation for the work that they do to shape the lives of our children. May 5th, is National Teacher Day!

a.span: Read more on Teacher and Professional Staff Appreciation Week

div.p: Online applications for public school open enrollment for the 2020-21 school year, Wisconsin’s public school choice program, will be available on the Department of Public Instruction website beginning Feb. 3 through May 29, 2020. For more information check out this link. DPI Open...
